name: Birdie Love - Baby, Toddler, Girls Outfit - Boutique Twirl Skirt & Appliqued Tee
description:
Buy original, buy handmade.  This outfit is custom made per order for your little one.  Please allow 2-3 weeks for me to make and ship your outfit.

The original fabric used in this listing (the orange with dots) has been discontinued and I will be substituting a brighter orange - which is only about 1 shade lighter.

* Short sleeve white cap sleeve tshirt comes with sizes 12 months - 5T / tank comes with sizes 6 - 8 Each will have the birdie applique.

* The skirt is made with orange polka dot fabric and two birdie pockets.

Please note size when you place your order! 

6-12 months
12-18 months
18-24 months
XS (2/3T) 19-20 inch waist, 9 inch length
S (3/4T) 20-21 inch waist, 10 inch length
M (4/5T) 21-22 inch waist, 11 inch length
L (5/6T) 22-23 inch waist, 12 inch length
XL (6/7) 23-24 inch waist, 13 inch length

OUTFITS come in the following size... please specify at checkout...

12 mo. short sleeve tee & 6-12 skirt
18 months short sleeve tee & 18-24 skirt
24 month short sleeve tee & 2/3 T skirt
3 T month short sleeve tee & 3/4 T skirt
4 T short sleeve tee & 4/5 T skirt 
5 T short sleeve tee & 5/6 T skirt
6 tank top & 6/7 skirt
7/8 tank top & 7/8 skirt

*******************
Christy Johnson Photography http://christyjphotos.blogspot.com
*******************

name: Callie Apron Outfit - Baby, Toddler, Girls - Boutique Twirl Skirt with applique shirt
description:
Simply precious. Simply adorned. Simply perfect for your girl.  This is a handmade outfit, please allow 2-3 weeks for me to make and ship your order.
.................................................................

This skirt is a twirl skirt with detachable apron secured with two buttons. It is 3 inches longer than my traditional twirl skirts.

The top coordinates perfectly with the skirt. 

***Tank as pictured comes in sizes: 4/5, 6, 7/8, and 10/12 
(sizes 6-12 are available for $6 more... convo me to set up a custom listing)

***Short Sleeve tee available for sizes: 12 months - 5T

* Each skirt has a boutique label and hang tag. 

* The seams are finished/serged. 

* All of my clothing is made in my smoke and pet FREE studio.

* My skirt sizes are as follows (approx.) Since the waist is made of elastic these are the unstretched waist sizes: I can also make them custom to the waist and length size you would prefer.

6-12 months
12-18 months

S (3/4T) 20-21 inch waist, 13 inch length
M (4/5T) 21-22 inch waist, 14 inch length

XL (6/7) 23-24 inch waist, 16 inch length
7/8 24-25 inch waist, 17 inch length

name: Lovely Lemon - Baby, Toddler, Girls - Boutique Twirl Skirt
description:
This is a handmade original boutique twirl skirt.  Please allow 2-3 weeks for me to make and ship your order

...................................................................................

So cute! I love this fabric. The lemon pattern is just so adorable. I used baby green ric rac at the bottom to highlight the lemon stems. It gives it a "finished" look. 

My skirt sizes are as follows (approx.) Since the waist is made of elastic these are the unstretched waist sizes: I can also make them custom to the waist and length size you would prefer.

6-12 months
12-18 months
18-24 months
XS (2/3T) 19-20 inch waist, 9 inch length
S (3/4T) 20-21 inch waist, 10 inch length
M (4/5T) 21-22 inch waist, 11 inch length
L (5/6T) 22-23 inch waist, 12 inch length
XL (6/7) 23-24 inch waist, 13 inch length

Larger sizes are available, convo me for more information.


Each skirt has a boutique label and hang tag. The seams are finished.

100% cotton (except elastic waistband). For best results- Machine wash on delicate or hand wash cycle in cold water. Tumble dry low/delicate or hang dry.
